item.title: Homework 1
item.description:
Assignment:

  • Give a definition of statistics,
  • What is a dataset? From the observation units to the dataset. Attributes and variables,
  • Find and list interesting applications of statistics to cybersecurity problems.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, my name is Andrea, I am a graduate student in computer engineering and now a student in the master’s degree in Cybersecurity at “La Sapienza”. This blog is hosted with GitHub pages and made with Hugo a framework for building websites. Also, if youâ€™re interested about my other past projects, I invite you to check out my Github.
